# [P-256,SHA-256]

# [secp256k1,SHA-256]

# Test vectors for secp256k1 were generated by a modified version of the following go script:
# https://github.com/aws/aws-lc/blob/main/crypto/fipsmodule/ecdsa/make_ecdsa_secp256k1_tests.go
#
# Script Modifications:
# - Add "Digest" field containing hash name
# - Add "Msg" field containing message
# - Add "Q" field by concatenating X and Y curve point (X || Y) and prepending with 0x04 (to signify uncompressed format)
# - Add "Sig" field by concatenating R and S (R || S) and ASN1 encoding the result
